text: @kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden Can you stop? You never taught in your life, 3 teachers had conference last month to prepare for school opening while they're maintaining CDC guidelines (wearing masks, gloves, 6ft  apart), 1died & 2 have coronavirus. STOP, I had to fill in my will 2 days ago for my only child
